author: andrewjones15
title: Absolute delight
text:
This hotel is in a fantastic location with beautiful views over the city. The rooms are large and well decorated. The roof terrace is wonderful for breakfast. It was an absolute delight to be welcome back after a hard day seeing the sights of Rome.
Room Tip: Book the upper floor See more room tips
